query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `verification_codes` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `type` enum('email','phone','password_reset') NOT NULL,
  `identifier` varchar(320) NOT NULL,
  `code` varchar(6) NOT NULL,
  `userId` int,
  `expiresAt` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `verified` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  CONSTRAINT `verification_codes_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `verification_codes_userId_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`userId`) REFERENCES `users`(`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE NO ACTION
);

CREATE INDEX `identifier_idx` ON `verification_codes` (`identifier`);
CREATE INDEX `expires_at_idx` ON `verification_codes` (`expiresAt`);
